constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 77 (Tuesday, May 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. AXNE:
H.R. 2959.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to the power granted to
Congress under Article I, Section 8 of the United States
Constitution.
[Page H2141]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

title: COVID-19 Fraud Prevention Act
